html: 4.8.17  10:29 pm   People tell me the best way to get better at drawing is to draw more, and I respect that. But when I start to draw I get disheartened by how shitty the drawing is and just stop halfway through. How do you stop this feeling? original_html: 4.8.17  10:29 pm   People tell me the best way to get better at drawing is to draw more, and I respect that. But when I start to draw I get disheartened by how shitty the drawing is and just stop halfway through. How do you stop this feeling? I really want to draw well because I have 20000 fully-formed universes, storylines and characters in my mind that I cannot express with words alone, and I'm afraid that I'll forget them if they don't appear.
